about_the_game:
Features

  • Explore the world - You'll need to upgrade your drone to survive the harsh environment and protect your team. The atmosphere and weather conditions will affect your ability to travel so use caves to shelter from a storm to travel deep or far and uncover new discoveries.

  • Genetic Slimes - All slimes are procedurally generated and adopt traits with mutations. There is a small chance for your slime to have a rare trait that may prove useful throughout your adventure.

  • Emotions - Slimes remember events and decide how they feel about you based on these events. Emotions are displayed.

  • You will encounter unfriendly foes so you may want to make sure that your slimes are well prepared!

Welcome to Sky Fields

Sky Fields is a creature-taming, pet simulator game with procedurally generated islands and slimes. Explore as a drone and grow a tribe of slimes. Happy slimes produce a valuable alternative fuel source so make sure your slimes are happy and well-fed! As you progress through diverse islands, each with unique environments and slime species, your goal is to collect Raw Slime to incubate. This will produce slimes with different appearances, strengths, rarities and other strange slime mutations! The altitude of each island affects the types of slimes you encounter, creating a dynamic and ever-evolving battle strategy.

Incubate, evolve, and conquer as your army multiplies!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2.2GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: Sky Fields is an Adventure-Colony Sim with procedurally generated areas, tamable creatures and a genetic breeding system. Fly through the clouds and to the Deep Under before returning home with goods for your growing family of slimes. Watch your slimes multiply and wreak havoc!
